1.name: Ground Assault
1.description: These vehicles are used for planetary ground assaults.

2.name: Air Assault
2.description: These vehicles are used in space and atmospheric combat.

3.name: Turbolaser
3.description: Laser turrets that can be used for ship to ship combat or planetary bombardments.

4.name: Ion Cannon
4.description: Ion cannons fire ionized particles capable of disrupting electronic systems

5.name: Tractor Beam
5.description: These projectors capture and/or divert space ships.
